application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1 - Robinia: Height 23m, spread 15m, dbh 70cm; Too large for site, ivy covered; Prune back to next 'V' after previous pollard points (Crown reduce by 3-4m) and sever ivy. Remaining crown size: height 19m, spread 11m.TG1 - Hornbeam x5: Height 4.5m, spread 3m, dbh 20cm; Too large for site; Trim and shape all around (Crown reduce by 0.5-1m). Remaining crown size: height 3.5m, spread 2m. T2 - Eucalyptus: Height 20m, spread 15m, dbh 72cm; Too large for site; Prune back to previous pruning points (Crown reduce by 1-1.5m). Remaining crown size: height 18.5m, spread 13.5m.T3 - Palm: Height 2.5m, dbh 10cm; Poor placement, too close to house; Fell.T4 - Holm oak: Height 6m, spread 5m, dbh 15cm; Too large for site; Trim all around (Reduce by 0.5-1m). Remaining crown size: height 5m, spread 4m.T5 - Pittosporum: Height 7m, spread 6m, dbh 40cm; Too large for site, scaffold limb; Remove scaffold limb and trim all around (Reduce by 1-1.5m). Remaining crown size: height 5.5m, spread 4.5m.T6 - Magnolia: Height 3m, spread 2m, dbh 22cm; Too large for site; Prune by a maximum of 0.3m to reshape. Remaining crown size: height 2.7m, spread 1.4m.T7 - Cherry: Height 2.5m, dbh 10cm; Poor health, stem decay, loss of bark, dead wood, defoliation; Fell. T8 - Laurel: Height 4m, spread 2m, dbh 10cm; Too large for site; Reduce height by 2m and shape. Remaining crown size: height 2m, spread 2m.T9 - Bay: Height 6m, spread 5m, dbh 60cml; Too large for site; Trim all around by 0.6m. Remaining crown size: height 5.4m, spread 4m.T10 - Yew: Height 3m, spread 3m, dbh 30cm; Too large for site; Trim back by 0.5m. Remaining crown size: height 3m, spread 2.5m.
